faster.title: Faster
faster.description: ELTCOIN will have faster transaction speeds than Litecoin. The average block time on Litecoin is <1>2 minutes</1>, while on Ethereum it's <3>30 seconds</3>.

cheaper.title: Cheaper
cheaper.description: Litecoin transaction fees are more <1>volatile</1>, whereas Ethereum fees are cheaper and vary within a tighter range of <3>$0.20 to $0.40</3>.

smarter.title: Smarter
smarter.description: ELTCOIN can work with smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. While there are plans to support them, Litecoin does not currently support smart contracts.

banner: WARNING: <1>eltc.io</1> is a scam. Be safe & secure.

what.title: What is ELTCOIN?
what.description: ELTCOIN seeks to be the preeminent ERC20 token with a limited supply.

why.title: Why create ELTCOIN?
why.description: To provide a provably fair currency on the Ethereum Network.

howMany.title: How many ELTCOIN are there?
howMany.description: The cap of ELTCOIN is 100,000,000 and can never be altered or modified.
